name: Boost Online Sales
author: ccrd

sections.description:
Use Boost Online Sales to boost your online sale!

Why use Boost Online Sales?
Easy to use, friendly, intuitive, organized, just install and you can start boost your sales.

Boost Online Sales is a tool that allow you to show a countdown timer with your sale offer and many other features that will be added.

Features

  • Countdown timer
  • Countdown timer for each product show on sale page
  • Custom Flash Sale Text

Settings

  • Enter the value for font size, borders
  • Activate the Sale Text Status
  • Set the position of Countdown

From within WordPress

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Enter ‘ccrd’ in ‘Search plugins…’ form
  3. Click ‘Install Now’ button and wait for install to finish
  4. Click ‘Activate’ blue button
  5. Go to “BoostSales” menu, left side, bottom

Manually

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the Boost Online Sales plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to “BoostSales” menu.

After activation

  1. Go to BoostSales Menu
  2. Configure fonts, position, Sale Custom Text and color
  3. Don’t forget to set special price and schedule time in WooCommerce product schedule!
sections.faq:
I’m trying to install the plugin, I’m looking for boost online sales plugin but I can not find it

When looking for a plugin in WordPress, the display criteria are set by WordPress and not by the developer. In this case just switch for ‘author’ instead of keyword, and type ccrd.

As WordPress index is something I don’t know how to work, I recommend looking for author (ccrd) or download the plugin for WordPress web site, then install.

What do I do after installing Boost Online Sales?

Just go to the settings menu and play with the desire fields.

I have a question and I urgently need an answer

Send email to support at info@app.ro and get the answer relatively quickly.

I want to make a recommendation…

that I think is extraordinary for the development of Boost Online Sales plugin and services. How am I doing?
Send mail to support at hdev dot info and summarize your idea. Do not be surprised if you are surprised!

It is also a good idea to visit the plugin page

You’ll find answers to many of your questions on the URI: Boost Online Sales
